overview: Based on a true story, Alison, a 25-year-old artist, is about to be reunited with her childhood love and best friend, Jeremy, whom she hasn't seen for ten years. After years of dating without success, she is excited to see him. Realizing that she has never stopped loving him, she believes, as adults, they can rekindle those feelings. But things don't always go according to plan.
title: Alison and Jeremy
